about_the_game:
This is a strategy-filled and humorous dungeon adventure game where you play as an unfortunate goblin janitor tasked with cleaning up the chaotic mess of the dungeon.

Your daily challenge is to figure out how to keep those countless reckless adventurers alive for just a few more days, so you don't end up overwhelmed by endless work! You may be unarmed and unable to directly control the powerful monsters or brave adventurers on the battlefield, but you have your wit—placing traps, moving items, and setting up the environment to indirectly influence the battle and get your job done!

This is a miniature strategy game based on an "attraction" mechanic. Adventurers and monsters move according to their behavior patterns, while you use the tools at your disposal to alter their paths to fulfill your betting goals. The game combines strategy, luck, and a uniquely humorous story, taking you on an unconventional cleaning adventure in the depths of the dungeon.

Get ready to make the dungeon shine, grab your broom, and challenge your fate—proving that even a lowly goblin janitor can make a difference!

content_descriptors.notes:
Fictional fantasy characters engage in gambling activities (Monster Gamble).
Scenes implying excessive alcohol consumption. 
Sensitive topics related to virtual races.

name: Bling Bling Goblin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a unique strategy game where players must use various items to attract the attention of characters on the board to achieve their betting objectives.
